name: GHE3R
description:
GHE3R is a game developed for the 72-hour Mini Jam 130. It is a platformer where you control a simple villager who is trying to reach his home. But is that all? Where is the challenge? Well, it turns out that he can only cross on floating platforms and the guy is allergic to water. The moon plays an important role as the tides will complicate the passage. Will our little friend be able to reach his home or will he get wet along the way?

press ESC to go to the menu from any level
